content: Research and development activities in the current year period focused on the advancement of our ischemic repair platform and related to execution of the FREEDOM trial, including preparation for an interim analysis and execution of the Phase Ib proof-of-concept trial of CLBS201 as a treatment for diabetic kidney disease, which commenced in the first quarter of 2022 with the first patient in the study treated in April 2022 and study closeout activities and preparation for the pre-consultation meetings with the Japanese Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices Agency, or PMDA, and for HONEDRA in critical limb ischemia and Buerger's disease in Japan.
